original_text: They attacked Judah and they took power over the land. They took away all the valuable things in the king's palace. They took his sons and his wives as their prisoners. The only son of Jehoram that remained was his youngest son, Ahaziah.
korean_text: 그들이 올라와서 유다를 침략하여 왕궁의 모든 재물과 그의 아들들과 아내들을 탈취하였으므로 막내 아들 여호아하스 외에는 한 아들도 남지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: and they took power over the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 땅에 대한 권세를 장악했다

sentences.original_text: They took away all the valuable things
They took his sons and his wives
The only son of Jehoram that remained
